name: flowfusion
description: Multi-Chain TWAP Bridge for Professional Trading

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:contracts && npm run install:web
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:service && npm run build:web
scripts.build:service: cd services/bridge-orchestrator && go build -o bin/orchestrator.exe cmd/main.go
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:service
scripts.deploy:local: cd packages/ethereum-contracts && npx hardhat deploy --network localhost
